title: Bug 38912DBCS: input special symbol breaks input method on jaJP
description: Bug 38912DBCS: input special symbol breaks input method on jaJP
OB: Trying to input special symbols using kinput2 (default linux input method forjaJP on Linux) breaks the input method on the widget.Steps1) Focus a Text widget2) Start input method (Shift+Space)3) Open Auxiliary Control Window (Insert)4) Choose a symbol and press enter5) Close the input method (Shift+Space)Bug: The symbol is insert on the widget twice Warning on the console:(<unknown:22311): GLibGObjectWARNING : gsignal.c:1972: handler `69' ofinstance `0x81321b8' is not blocked From now on any input (SBCS or DBCS) that goes thru the commit won't be inserton the widget.For the StyledText inserting symbols does not work but attemping to do so doesnot cause the input method to stop work.Works on Motif.
